introduction: THE WHALERS is a hybrid poetic documentary that explores the personal family history of director Marte Vold’s Norwegian whaling heritage, through a collection of travel letters from her grandfather. The film delves into the post-war travels of her grandfather and his experiences in Europe, Antarctica, and Norway.THE WHALERS is a poetic and intimate portrait of family and heritage, examining how this legacy has influenced contemporary Norway. We are after all, a product of our mothers and fathers.
